com.calculator.classes

Class CalculatorAdvancedOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.calculator.classes.CalculatorAdvancedOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface

    public class CalculatorAdvancedOperations
extends java.lang.Object
implements CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface
    This class contains nine operations for advance methods of the Scientific Calculator program. (percent,power,squareRoot,sine,cosine,tangent,absolute,PiNumber,Negative) Each method in this class does the calculation needed for each method. This class implements from the interface for advance operations.

        Specified by:

      • power

        public double power(double firstNumber,
                    double secondNumber)
        Calculate firstNumber to power of secondNumber. It shows error message if the result becomes bigger than double max value or smaller than double min value or if it is not a number(NaN).
        Specified by:
        power in interface CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface

      • squareRoot

        public double squareRoot(double firstNumber)
        Calculates the square root of firstNumber. It shows an error message if number is negative.
        Specified by:
        squareRoot in interface CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface

      • tangent

        public double tangent(double firstNumber)
        Calculates tangent of the firstNumber in degree. Error message will be shown for tangent of 90 or -90 degree, since it will be infinite.
        Specified by:
        tangent in interface CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface
